executable.title: Mice DTI Resampling Batchmake 2
executable.description: Starts a pipeline from a DWI, computes the DTI, register it using a scalar image, and computes the new scalar image from the registered DTI
executable.acknowledgements: This command is based on multiple external tools

string-enumeration.name: inputType
string-enumeration.description: input is either a DWI, a DTI or a scalar image
string-enumeration.label: Input type

image.name: templateFile
image.description: Template, also used a reference image to resample the images if transform is known
image.label: Template/Reference

string.name: rootName
string.label: Output files root name
string.description: rootname to use for files (otherwise uses input file name)

image.name: imnn1
image.label: Image 4 (Nearest Neighborhood interpolation)
image.description: Additional scalar image to transform (Nearest Neighborhood interpolation)

image.name: imnn2
image.label: Image 5 (Nearest Neighborhood interpolation)
image.description: Additional scalar image to transform (Nearest Neighborhood interpolation)

boolean.name: computeOrientation
boolean.description: Change the orientation of the image so that it is oriented properly
boolean.label: Change orientation

string.name: manualOrientation
string.description: Compute the transformation to obtain the image oriented properly manually
string.label: Original Image Orientation

transform.name: initialTransform
transform.label: Initial transform Node (if transform is known)

boolean.name: computeColorFA
boolean.description: Compute Color FA from resampled DTI
boolean.label: Compute Color FA

boolean.name: computeRadial
boolean.description: Compute Radial Diffusivity (RD) from resampled DTI
boolean.label: Compute RD

boolean.name: computeAxial
boolean.description: Compute Axial Diffusivity (AD) from resampled DTI
boolean.label: Compute AD

boolean.name: scale
boolean.description: Scale the image and the atlas to 1,1,1
boolean.label: Scale to 1,1,1

boolean.name: nologEuclidean
boolean.description: Do not use the log euclidean framework to resample the DTI
boolean.label: nolog-Euclidean

boolean.name: copyInputs
boolean.description: Copy the input images to the output directory
boolean.label: Copy Inputs

string-enumeration.name: interpolationType
string-enumeration.description: Setting the interpolation type when resampling the image
string-enumeration.label: Interpolation type

string-enumeration.name: registrationType
string-enumeration.description: Setting the type of image used for the registration
string-enumeration.label: Registration type

string-enumeration.name: runChoice
string-enumeration.description: Select to not run, or run normally or on local grid using Condor (BatchMake must have been compiled using Condor)
string-enumeration.label: Run Choice
